snippet: Attendees at the International Consumer Electronics Show will find a surprising number of low-tech products alongside the smartphones, including razors, mattresses and vibrators. Marketers have decided that people at the show are their target market...
abstract: Attendees at the International Consumer Electronics Show will find a surprising number of low-tech products alongside the smartphones, including razors, mattresses and vibrators. Marketers have decided that people at the show are their target market for these products.

headline.main: Need a Mattress to Go With That TV? You're in the Right Place
